chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, in HTML, there's an IMG tag.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: As soon as you put IMG,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: both SRC and ALT are its required attributes.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In fact, you can also not write ALT,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: but it's recommended.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll tell you what happens with these attributes.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: First of all, if you write in SRC,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: image.png.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see this image here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I'll put train image in ALT.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, if I show you this in the browser,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: previewing,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then you can see this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is our page and this is the train image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What happened by doing this?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Where did the ALT go?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can say,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll tell you where it went.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, the thing we put in ALT,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: we didn't see it now.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's say, for some reason,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: the server doesn't show you the image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What will happen then?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's say I wrote image2 by mistake.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, there's no file named image2.png.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What will be the error?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What will happen?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll show you what will happen.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, ALT will be displayed here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And this kind of an error image will be displayed.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which will tell you that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: the image you've put,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: put it properly,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you've done something wrong.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Or the server URL you've given,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: there's no image there.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: These things are displayed like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And ALT is displayed there.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, the user gets to know

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: what's the purpose of this image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And if I come back here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can put ALT in the image like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I don't put ALT,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: what will happen?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I don't put ALT,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: the ALT text won't show up.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, you won't want the user to see this image

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: when your server error comes up.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You'll want it to be like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: The user will see it like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It's written in train image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You'll see it like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I hope you understood this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, the image is straightforward.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There are two more attributes of it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which are very important.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: One is width.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which is width in pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I set it to 23,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: width is equal to,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In fact, I'll fix the image first.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I've written image2 by mistake.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It's image.png.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, you can see here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I've taken 23 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which is very small.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I'll make it 230 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You don't need to write PX in this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: When we write width in CSS,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: we'll see that we need to write PX.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Or we just write width equal to double quotes

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: in the number.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, if I bring it here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can see that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: we've seen this small image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I give it the height,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll give it the height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll give it the height as well.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll say that if I keep its height 230,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then its aspect ratio will also be reduced.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, it'll get a little stretched.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Because it has made its width 230

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and its height 230 as you can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, if you want its height to be 230

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and its width to be automatically adjusted,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then you just use height attribute.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, remove the width one here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, its height will be 230 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And it'll go as far as it can go in width.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It'll automatically adjust.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, look.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It's automatically adjusted in width.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And it took this in height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, what happens is that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: width and height can be adjusted through CSS.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And we'll see in the CSS section

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: why we should always set this width and height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We should always set one thing from width and height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Such that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: when our page is loading,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then the image inside our page

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: should not come out instantly.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll tell you in the upcoming videos.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But now you understand that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: these width and height attributes,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I've heard that these are deprecated

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and should not be used now.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But I say that they should be used for SEO purposes.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Why should they be used?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll tell you in the upcoming videos

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: about core web vitals and SEO.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For now, you can assume that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: width gives image to width,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: height gives image to height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If one of them is set,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then the other one automatically sets.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And these values are in pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And you don't have to write PX or pixel.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You just have to write this number.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And that's it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is an attribute, height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And an SRC attribute, alt attribute.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can also use style attribute in this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In fact, you can use style attribute

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: with almost all tags.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, this was about image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, we'll talk about tables in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Table tags are very useful in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll tell you what table tags are.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see a table from table tags.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, I'll copy this table from here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And when I copy this table from here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can see my page will look like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, this is the table of HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Where is my preview page?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here it is.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here, you can see the name, HarryAge100.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, if I add more things here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: suppose I add something like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose I add name.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And here I add, let us say,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Harry's designation.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose I add programmer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And let us say, I want to add more things.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll use alt shift bottom arrow key.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll use alt shift bottom arrow key.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And here, let us say,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I want to write

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: favorite language.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I want to write, suppose,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: JavaScript.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And now, you can see, this table will look like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Name, destination, favorite language.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, what is this?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: How does it work? I'll tell you.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let us say, we used table tag.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Table tag has tr tag, which is table row.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What will come in this row?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You'll get to see this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, if you want to use this as table heading,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you'll say, this is my table row.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is my row.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Name, destination, and your favorite language.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What will come in this row?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And what will be that?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here, you can see, it will be a heading.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I'll use th.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Th means table heading.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And we'll write it only once.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Once we put the heading,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then we'll put the data.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, we'll put td in table row.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which stands for table data.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And here, all the rows you put in tr,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: your rows will be added.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, here, let us say, I write

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Sam, and this is also a programmer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And suppose, this is

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Java, its favorite language.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, these rows will be added below the table.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see, these rows are added, added, added.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: With CSS, we'll see

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how it can be bordered,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: but it looks like a default.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And yes, I know it's ugly,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: but you just understand,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that table works like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, there are rowspan and callspan attributes.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, you see here, rowspan means

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how many rows your td will span.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For example,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: let us say, I write here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I want Sam and programmer,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: first, I wanted to take one cell, Sam,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then programmer. I want to write Sam

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: in two cells.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that Sam will now take

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Sam will now take two columns instead.

chunks.text: So, it took this whole column instead.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, call span means

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how many columns will be bordered.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: By default, one cell will be bordered,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: but sometimes, one cell will be bordered by two columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: To demonstrate this, I'll explain it to you

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In Excel, you can understand that this is a table of HTML.

chunks.text: Sometimes, I want to

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, here we use merge cell.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: by using call span. Sometimes, we want

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: to merge vertically.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's say, I want to merge these two cells.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There, we use rowspan.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And with whom we'll use rowspan?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, we'll use call span with td, and rowspan

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: with td. So, we'll use rowspan with td.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, it'll span two rows like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I hope you understood this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And when we'll make tables of HTML,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you'll understand it better.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But let me show you rowspan quickly.

chunks.text: So, if I write rowspan as

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.text: Now, to better explain this,

chunks.text: So, I said that this row has

chunks.text: Then I said that this Sam

chunks.text: So, when Java took 2 rows, it means

chunks.text: because its row has already been surrounded.

chunks.text: So, I'll not write Java in the next one.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I'll not write Java here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, this is how you can use rowspan and callspan in HTML.

chunks.text: In HTML table, we can add captions.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can also add header and footer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can add Thead and Tfoot.

chunks.text: You can add header and footer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For example, if I add some content

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: in Thead and Tfoot,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: like this,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then you can see Thead and Tfoot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see that header and footer are added here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, I'll tell you about another tag

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: which is called brtag

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: which adds line break.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, you can see that everything is down.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, this is header.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I'll add footer down here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I won't add it here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll add it after my table.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, this is my table footer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, I can change it by using CSS.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, I can group my header and footer

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: with Thead and Tfoot like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, what will be the header of my table?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can group this here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can add it in Thead.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Along with that,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: the content in the table

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: will be added in the Tbody.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, what will be in the Tbody?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll add the content of my table like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And after this,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: if I write Tfoot here

chunks.text: and I want to add some data at the end,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then I'll add another TR.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: As you can see, I'll right-click it

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and document the format.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, it'll be a better format.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose, I want to add this kind of TR

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then I'll add the grouping method.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I've added some TR in Tfoot,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I've added the main body in Tbody

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and I've added it in Thead

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: which is the header of my table.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Obviously, there won't be any change.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I've only grouped it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll write footer here

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: so that you can see that it's footer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll write foot here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And you can see that the last row is foot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, what's the benefit of doing this?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We've only grouped it so that we can target it from CSS.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, you'll use this very rarely.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But you can do grouping like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Your whole table will have head content

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and foot content here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Body content comes in between head and foot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But you can write it here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Ideally, head, body and foot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I hope you understood this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, that's all about HTML tables.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You don't need to know more than this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, we'll talk about list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: List is very important in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: because we'll use it a lot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There are 3 types of lists in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There are ordered list, unordered list and definition list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Unordered and ordered list are the most used.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's see unordered list first.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Whenever we want to write unordered data

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: like I'll write UL here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I'll write UL here

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: which means unordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can write Li in it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can write Harry.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: After that, I can write Rohan.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And after that, I can write Shubham.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, when I write Harry, Rohan and Shubham

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then I can write UL here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: When I write Harry, Rohan and Shubham

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then I can write UL here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is unordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here, Harry, Rohan and Shubham are here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: They don't have any order.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But if I want it to be ordered

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then I can write it with the help of OL.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I make its opening, closing tag OL

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and keep the other things the same

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then it will be ordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, here it will have 1, 2, 3.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can do ABC,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can do capital ABC,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can do Roman numbers,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can do all these.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see here

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that I have written Li in UL

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: so it came like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see here that I have written Li in OL

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: so it is 1, 2, 3.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is the example of ordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Definition list is rarely used.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It is previewed like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I have added heading

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and then I have written DL.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: DL means definition list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: After that, DT and then DD.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, here definition term is there

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and this is the definition of definition.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can change CSS as well.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It is rarely used.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But you should know about it for interviews.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If you ask about definition list

chunks.text: then this type of code is previewed like this.

chunks.text: I am not showing it for the sake of time

chunks.text: but try it out.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here we will see

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I have told you about unordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It is very simple and straightforward.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can customize its bullet points

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: by using type attribute.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's write type is equal to square.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will write type is equal to square.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's say I write square.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I have written type is equal to square

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: in the unordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It is previewed like square.

chunks.text: Similarly, I can circle

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: its type in the unordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can square it and I can disc it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Disc is by default.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can square it and I can circle it.

chunks.text: Along with that,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can add

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: many other list items

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In the unordered list,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: but you can use type is equal to i

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
